amendment.description: To exempt children of certain Filipino World War II veterans from the numerical limitations on immigrant visas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2979 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2979 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Hirono to Amendment SA 3748. To exempt children of certain Filipino World War II veterans from the numerical limitations on immigrant visas.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2979 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2979 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Hirono to Amendment SA 3748.
